userStories.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
userStories.tip: Take a prescribed ED medication.  Let your partner know it is not their fault.

condition.description:
Erectile dysfunction (ED) is a common type of male sexual dysfunction. It is when a man has trouble getting or keeping an erection. ED becomes more common as you get older. But it's not a natural part of aging.

Some people have trouble speaking with their doctors about sex. But if you have ED, you should tell your doctor. ED can be a sign of health problems. It may mean your blood vessels are clogged. It may mean you have nerve damage from diabetes. If you don't see your doctor, these problems will go untreated.

Your doctor can offer several new treatments for ED. For many men, the answer is as simple as taking a pill. Getting more exercise, losing weight, or stopping smoking may also help.

NIH: National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases
condition.name: Erectile dysfunction

carousel_items: Comes in two differents doses: one that's taken on a regular basis and the other only when you need it.
If you're taking Cialis on a regular basis, take it at the same time every day.
Don't take [name_ommon] more than once a day.
Can be taken with or without food.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol when you're taking this medication since it can make dizziness worse.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Cialis is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection. Cialis also treats enlarged prostate symptoms.
basics.bottom_line: Cialis is the only medication in its class that treats both erectile dysfunction and enlarged prostate symptoms. You can also take it on a regular basis, which can allow for more spontaneity, but it can be expensive.
downsides: Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

downsides_processed.orig: Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

upsides: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It's the only one in its class to also treat enlarged prostate symptoms.
Can be taken either as needed, or on a regular basis (which allows you to be more spontaneous before sex).
Can be taken with or without food.
Lasts longer than Viagra.

upsides_processed.orig: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It's the only one in its class to also treat enlarged prostate symptoms.
Can be taken either as needed, or on a regular basis (which allows you to be more spontaneous before sex).
Can be taken with or without food.
Lasts longer than Viagra.

userStories.tip: Dosages are probably too high that are prescribed. Even a tiny dose helps.
Does cause some headaches. Works fast (20 min). Works for 48 (and sometimes more) hours
improved urination as well as improved erections

drugs.name: Cialis

carousel_items_processed.orig: Comes in two differents doses: one that's taken on a regular basis and the other only when you need it.
If you're taking Cialis on a regular basis, take it at the same time every day.
Don't take [name_ommon] more than once a day.
Can be taken with or without food.
Don't drink a lot of alcohol when you're taking this medication since it can make dizziness worse.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Cialis for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past. Also, it is not recommended for men to take Cialis if they've had a heart attack in the past 3 months or a stroke or a diagnosis of moderate to severe heart failure in the past 6 months.  Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

description_processed.orig: Taking Cialis for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past. Also, it is not recommended for men to take Cialis if they've had a heart attack in the past 3 months or a stroke or a diagnosis of moderate to severe heart failure in the past 6 months.  Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Prolonged erection
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Cialis. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Cialis. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

risks_warnings.title: Vision changes
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

risks_warnings.title: Hearing loss
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Cialis. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

carousel_items: It's best to take Levitra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.

basics.benefits_moa: Levitra is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection.
basics.bottom_line: Levitra is a first-choice treatment for erectile dysfunction. However, you have to take it at least 60 minutes prior to sex, so the lack of spontaneity may not be good for some people. It can also be expensive.
downsides: Needs to be taken at least 60 minutes before sex.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
You need to reduce the amount of grapefruit you eat while taking Levitra.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

downsides_processed.orig: Needs to be taken at least 60 minutes before sex.
Only available as brand name, so it can be expensive.
You need to reduce the amount of grapefruit you eat while taking Levitra.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).

upsides: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
It can be taken only when you need it.
It can be taken with or without food.
Available in two different forms, as a regular tablet and as an orally-disintegrating tablet.

It can be taken with or without food.

Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Levitra for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past, especially in the past 6 months and is not recommended. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.
risk_factors: Having a heart attack, stroke, or rhythm problem in your heart in the last 6 months
Having low or high blood pressure
Heart failure or coronary artery disease causing unstable angina (chest pain)

If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Levitra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

risks_warnings.title: Hearing loss
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Levitra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Levitra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking alpha blockers or medications for high blood pressure and you're taking Levitra, your blood pressure may become too low. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position since this can make you feel dizzy and more likely to fall. Talk to your doctor if your medications need to be changed.
risk_factors: Taking medications for high blood pressure

description_processed.orig: If you're taking alpha blockers or medications for high blood pressure and you're taking Levitra, your blood pressure may become too low. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position since this can make you feel dizzy and more likely to fall. Talk to your doctor if your medications need to be changed.

risks_warnings.title: Heart rhythm problems
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking medications to control your heart rhythm, taking Levitra can make the rhythm worse. Talk to your doctor to see if you need an alternate medication for your erectile dysfunction.
risk_factors: Taking medications to control your heart rhythm

carousel_items: Need to take this drug at the same time every day.
Can cause a headache, flushing, or nosebleeds.
Don't take two doses at the same time if you missed a dose.
The oral liquid (suspension) is good for 60 days or 2 months. Make sure to shake it well before using.

basics.benefits_moa: Revatio is a PDE-5 inhibitor. It relaxes blood vessels in the lungs, which lowers their blood pressure.
basics.bottom_line: Revatio is a first-choice treatment for pulmonary hypertension (high blood pressure in the lungs).
downsides: Can cause dizziness during the first few days of taking this medication.
If you're using Revatio for high blood pressure in the lungs, you can't use Viagra or other erectile dysfunction drugs.
You also can't use other forms of nitrates or nitroglycerin while on Revatio.

downsides_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness during the first few days of taking this medication.
If you're using Revatio for high blood pressure in the lungs, you can't use Viagra or other erectile dysfunction drugs.
You also can't use other forms of nitrates or nitroglycerin while on Revatio.

upsides: It's a first-choice medication for treating high blood pressure in the lungs.
It's available as a generic medication.
Different doses of Sildenafil are also used to treat erectile dysfunction.

upsides_processed.orig: It's a first-choice medication for treating high blood pressure in the lungs.
It's available as a generic medication.
Different doses of Sildenafil are also used to treat erectile dysfunction.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure in your lungs.

carousel_items: It's best to take Viagra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.
Works best when taken on an empty stomach. Fatty foods can prevent Viagra from working as well.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Viagra is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection.
basics.bottom_line: Viagra is a first-choice treatment for erectile dysfunction. It's the only one that's available as a generic, so it's cheaper than the alternatives. However, you need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex, so the lack of spontaneity may not be good for some people.
downsides: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.
Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).
Taking it after eating a high-fat meal can delay or reduce the medication's benefits.

downsides_processed.orig: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.

It can be taken only when you need it.

carousel_items: Can cause dizziness or fainting in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause fatigue or headache.
Take the extended release tablet with breakfast.
You might need to check your blood pressure from time to time while taking this medicine.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.

basics.benefits_moa: Doxazosin is a selective alpha blocker. It relaxes the urethra and prostate, which makes it easier to urinate. It also lowers blood pressure by relaxing blood vessels.
basics.bottom_line: For men, Doxazosin will help make it easier to urinate so that you're not getting up a lot at night. It's a last-choice treatment for high blood pressure.
downsides: A last-choice treatment for high blood pressure because other medicines are more effective at preventing heart disease. Your doctor might add it to a medicine you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.

downsides_processed.orig: A last-choice treatment for high blood pressure because other medicines are more effective at preventing heart disease. Your doctor might add it to a medicine you're already taking if your blood pressure is still too high.

upsides: A first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate. Makes it easier to urinate.

upsides_processed.orig: A first-choice treatment for enlarged prostate. Makes it easier to urinate.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and makes it easier to urinate.

userStories.tip: It effects your mood after a few weeks and caused anxiety attacks for me after three months. Also headaches and dizziness on a daily basis. Heart consultant told me to stop taking it. Only a 1mg doseage for me but enough to cause problems
userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping

userStories.tip: Take it at bedtime everyday for BPH symptoms

drugs.name: Cardura

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness or fainting in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause fatigue or headache.
Take the extended release tablet with breakfast.
You might need to check your blood pressure from time to time while taking this medicine.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: Dizziness or fainting may occur when taking Doxazosin when you change positions, such as going from a seated or lying down position to standing because of changes in your blood pressure, which may lead to falls. This is called orthostatic hypotension. Be very careful when changing positions, especially if you're just starting to take Doxazosin or if changes in dosing have to be made. Talk to your doctor if the dizziness doesn't go away or if you find it bothersome.

description_processed.orig: Dizziness or fainting may occur when taking Doxazosin when you change positions, such as going from a seated or lying down position to standing because of changes in your blood pressure, which may lead to falls. This is called orthostatic hypotension. Be very careful when changing positions, especially if you're just starting to take Doxazosin or if changes in dosing have to be made. Talk to your doctor if the dizziness doesn't go away or if you find it bothersome.

risks_warnings.title: Painful erection
risks_warnings.description: Rare reports of a painful erection unrelieved by sex have been reported by men who take Doxazosin, which is also called priapism. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop this as impotence can happen if this isn't treated in time.

description_processed.orig: Rare reports of a painful erection unrelieved by sex have been reported by men who take Doxazosin, which is also called priapism. Contact your doctor immediately if you develop this as impotence can happen if this isn't treated in time.

risks_warnings.title: Intraoperative floppy iris syndrome
risks_warnings.description: If you are planning to have surgery for cataracts, let your surgeon know that you are taking Doxazosin as a rare condition called intraoperative floppy iris syndrome has been known to happen. Your surgeon will tell you if adjustments need to be made.

description_processed.orig: If you are planning to have surgery for cataracts, let your surgeon know that you are taking Doxazosin as a rare condition called intraoperative floppy iris syndrome has been known to happen. Your surgeon will tell you if adjustments need to be made.

carousel_items: Can cause dizziness in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Tell your doctor about any dizziness, fatigue, cough, or throat irritation that doesn't go away.
Requires routine blood tests to check kidney function.
Don't take it if you're pregnant.

basics.benefits_moa: Diovan is an angiotensin receptor blocker (ARB). It blocks a chemical that tightens blood vessels. This makes blood vessels relax, which lowers blood pressure and allows more blood and oxygen to get to your heart and other organs.
basics.bottom_line: Diovan is a good blood pressure-lowering medicine that protects kidney function like an ACE inhibitor, but with fewer side effects.
downsides: Requires a yearly blood test to see how the medicine is affecting your body.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

downsides_processed.orig: Requires a yearly blood test to see how the medicine is affecting your body.
Not safe to use if you're pregnant.

upsides: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.
Lowers the risk of heart attack and stroke.
Similar to ACE inhibitors (like Lisinopril), with fewer side effects like cough and swelling.
Protects kidney function, which is especially useful for people with diabetes or mild-to-moderate kidney disease.
Recommended for anyone with heart failure since it lowers the risk of death and further damage to your heart.

upsides_processed.orig: A first-choice blood pressure treatment for many people.

Recommended for anyone with heart failure since it lowers the risk of death and further damage to your heart.

Lots of sudden coughing spells

drugs.name: Diovan

carousel_items_processed.orig: Can cause dizziness in the first few days.
Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Tell your doctor about any dizziness, fatigue, cough, or throat irritation that doesn't go away.
Requires routine blood tests to check kidney function.
Don't take it if you're pregnant.

risks_warnings.title: Harm to fetus
risks_warnings.description: Diovan can cause birth defects or death to a fetus. If you are pregnant or considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medicines.

description_processed.orig: Diovan can cause birth defects or death to a fetus. If you are pregnant or considering having a baby, talk to your doctor about alternative medicines.

risks_warnings.title: Unusual tongue swelling
risks_warnings.description: Angioedema, or swelling in the face, lip, tongue, throat, can happen at anytime of using Diovan. Seek immediate medical attention for any swelling.

description_processed.orig: Angioedema, or swelling in the face, lip, tongue, throat, can happen at anytime of using Diovan. Seek immediate medical attention for any swelling.

risks_warnings.title: Heart problems due to high potassium
risks_warnings.description: Diovan can increase the amount of potassium in your body. High potassium can cause heart problems. Baseline and follow-up lab tests are needed before starting Diovan.

description_processed.orig: Diovan can increase the amount of potassium in your body. High potassium can cause heart problems. Baseline and follow-up lab tests are needed before starting Diovan.

userStories.identifier: in excellent condition for my age I
userStories.tip: did develop a dry cough now and then  I didn't realize was losartin side effect. I took it as a much cheaper drug than one I was using which was similar. A 100 dollar difference a month. I tried the more expensive one and then switched back

If I had looked up the adverse side effects before taking it I would never have allowed myself to be put on it! I developed all of them. I felt like I was dying! Now I check out all medication before starting a new prescription!

Take the medication in the morning at the same time each day.
my physician halved the dose to deal with throat irritation/dry cough

carousel_items: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause drowsiness, headache, dizziness, and nausea.
Take with food or at bedtime to avoid side effects.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.
Recheck your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine.

basics.benefits_moa: Prazosin is a selective alpha blocker. It lowers blood pressure by relaxing blood vessels. It also relaxes the urethra and prostate, which makes it easier to urinate.
basics.bottom_line: Prazosin is used mostly to make urination easier for men with an enlarged prostate, but it can cause dizziness.
downsides: Not the best medicine to lower blood pressure by itself.
Likely to cause orthostatic hypotension. This means dizziness when you change positions (like standing up) because your blood pressure doesn't adjust quickly enough.
Not preferred for people 65 years or older.

downsides_processed.orig: Not the best medicine to lower blood pressure by itself.
Likely to cause orthostatic hypotension. This means dizziness when you change positions (like standing up) because your blood pressure doesn't adjust quickly enough.
Not preferred for people 65 years or older.

upsides: Can be added to other blood pressure-lowering medicines if you need additional blood pressure control.
Makes urination easier in men with an enlarged prostate.
Helps people with PTSD get better sleep with fewer, less-intense nightmares.

upsides_processed.orig: Can be added to other blood pressure-lowering medicines if you need additional blood pressure control.
Makes urination easier in men with an enlarged prostate.
Helps people with PTSD get better sleep with fewer, less-intense nightmares.

drugs.one_liner: Lowers blood pressure and makes it easier to urinate.
drugs.name: Prazosin

carousel_items_processed.orig: Check your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine, and tell your doctor if it hasn't improved.
Can cause drowsiness, headache, dizziness, and nausea.
Take with food or at bedtime to avoid side effects.
If side effects don't go away, talk to your doctor about alternatives.
Recheck your blood pressure 1 week after starting this medicine.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure (orthostatic hypotension)
risks_warnings.description: You can feel dizzy or fall from a sudden drop in blood pressure when you change positions, such as going from sitting to standing. This is called orthostatic hypotension. If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly until your body is used to the medicine. If symptoms continues for more than a week, dose adjustment or a different medication may be needed.

description_processed.orig: You can feel dizzy or fall from a sudden drop in blood pressure when you change positions, such as going from sitting to standing. This is called orthostatic hypotension. If you're sensitive to low blood pressure, change position slowly until your body is used to the medicine. If symptoms continues for more than a week, dose adjustment or a different medication may be needed.

carousel_items: It's best to take Viagra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.
Works best when taken on an empty stomach. Fatty foods can prevent Viagra from working as well.

clock.tip: Works slower when taken with food.

basics.benefits_moa: Viagra is a PDE-5 inhibitor. Blocking PDE-5 allows blood to enter the penis and helps create an erection.
basics.bottom_line: Viagra is a first-choice treatment for erectile dysfunction. It's the only one that's available as a generic, so it's cheaper than the alternatives. However, you need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex, so the lack of spontaneity may not be good for some people.
downsides: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.
Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).
Taking it after eating a high-fat meal can delay or reduce the medication's benefits.

downsides_processed.orig: You need to take it at least 30 minutes prior to sex.
Can't be taken if you've had a heart attack in the past 3 months, or stroke or heart failure in the past 6 months.
Side effects can be more pronounced if you're over 65 years.
Can cause flushing, headache, and dizziness, or sudden hearing and vision changes.
Can't use if you've recently taken nitrates like Isordil, Imdur, or nitroglycerin (Nitro-BID, Nitro-Dur, Nitrostat).
Taking it after eating a high-fat meal can delay or reduce the medication's benefits.

upsides: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
Available as a generic, so it's cheaper than other medications in its class.
It can be taken only when you need it.

upsides_processed.orig: First-choice medication for treating erectile dysfunction.
Available as a generic, so it's cheaper than other medications in its class.
It can be taken only when you need it.

userStories.satisfaction: Not worth it, thinking about stopping
userStories.tip: 1 NOTHING, 1 NOTHING, 3, NOTHING. I QUIT THIS CRAP!!!!
Everyone knows what VIagra does. It works well, and I'm glad I finally talked to my doctor.

For a long time I used the original Viagra pills prescribed by my doctor. Basically it works perfect, but last few months i buying Viagra only in one of our italian medical stores: http://www.casafarmacia.com/ And it works well as original.

drugs.name: Viagra

off-label_indications.indication: Sexual dysfunction from a spinal cord injury
condition_url_name: Sexual dysfunction from a spinal cord injury

off-label_indications.indication: Sexual dysfunction from taking an SSRI antidepressant

carousel_items_processed.orig: It's best to take Viagra about 1 hour before sexual activity, but you can take it anywhere between 4 hours and 30 minutes before you need it.
Don't take it more than once a day.
If you have an erection for more than 4 hours, go to the ER or call your doctor.
Can cause flushing, a headache, or dizziness.
Works best when taken on an empty stomach. Fatty foods can prevent Viagra from working as well.

risks_warnings.title: Heart attack or stroke
risks_warnings.description: Taking Viagra for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past, especially in the past 6 months. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.
risk_factors: Having a heart attack, stroke, or rhythm problem in your heart in the last 6 months
Having low or high blood pressure
Heart failure or coronary artery disease causing unstable angina (chest pain)

description_processed.orig: Taking Viagra for erectile dysfunction can put you at increased risk for heart attack or stroke if you've had problems with your heart in the past, especially in the past 6 months. Talk to your doctor if you are interested in taking this medication.

risks_warnings.title: Prolonged erection
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Viagra. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having an erection lasting more than 4 hours while on Viagra. This has been rare. If not treated in time, this can cause permanent damage to your penis, including impotence. Talk to your doctor immediately or go to the emergency room if this happens.

risks_warnings.title: Vision changes
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Viagra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent damage to their vision while on Viagra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you suddenly notice changes in your vision in one or both eyes.

risks_warnings.title: Hearing loss
risks_warnings.description: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Viagra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

description_processed.orig: There have been reports of men having permanent hearing loss while on Viagra. This has been rare. Go to the emergency room or call your doctor immediately if you notice changes in your hearing in one or both ears.

risks_warnings.title: Low blood pressure
risks_warnings.description: If you're taking alpha blockers or medications for high blood pressure and you're taking Viagra, your blood pressure may become too low. Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position since this can make you feel dizzy and more likely to fall. Talk to your doctor if your medications need to be changed.
risk_factors: Taking medications for high blood pressure

Be very careful getting up from a sitting or lying down position since this can make you feel dizzy and more likely to fall. Talk to your doctor if your medications need to be changed.

surveys.question: What tip would you give someone like me who was just diagnosed?
surveys.tip: Take a prescribed ED medication.  Let your partner know it is not their fault.
